name: Denise Meyers
text: My order was given to another customer.  The reason I still give 5 stars is because of the professionalism the manager showed.  On top of that my food was delicious. My first time trying Hungry Howie's and I will definitely return.

text: I havent had Hungry Howies in a long time and I really enjoyed it.  They delivered to our hotel room, which was very convenient.  Almost everything was perfect, except for the cucumbers on our greek salad.  They were so old and transparent ‚Ä¶More

text: Ordered the other day. ok pizza but absolutely disgusting cheese bread cheese bread there now tastes like straight up oil. pizza is still good there but cheese bread is a big difference and not a good one.

text: Service is very poor. Numerous times I asked for delivery and they had me down for carryout! I was upset because I had to Wait hours for their constant mistake.
